page.title: 19OXSHOTT RIDING STABLES
page.content: {Lower Farm Riding Stables}looks after approximately 60 horses. Of these, 15 are school horses and the rest are kept separately and each horse is fed and watered three times a day. There are 4 big barns (2 are 17th century) and 2 circular spaces where lessons are taught. The first ring is filled with woodchips, and used mostly by beginners, and the other ring is filled with sand and is usually used by experienced riders. The school has 10 permanent staff, and other temporary ones at weekends. The prices are:-Weekdays 1 hour Â£4.50, 2 hours Â£7.50 for lessons and treks. The prices are more expensive in the evening - 1 hour is Â£6.50; 2 hours are Â£9.50. The stables are very well organised and have a lot of customers.
